name: IMSCARED - 2022 TEST BUILD
description:
IMSCARED - 2022 test build is a free demo for the upcoming 2022 update of my old game (a demo made to celebrate my birthday! Hooray!).

This test covers the whole "A Pixelated Nightmare" section, that is the 2012 original content. The purpose of this test is to see how well the file system works (and since we're here, to let you all get a sneak peek of what I'm working on).

At the end of this build you'll be redirected to a survey: please feel free to fill in the form in order to help me making a good update!

As I'm uploading, I know that weird stuff happens with screen size/fullscreen... Sorry about that... BUT STILL! Hope you'll like the result :) 

Ivan
